name: 公部門人力資源專題研究
description: 基於個別化教與學的精神，讓研究生依其興趣，針對公部門人力資源有關領域，進行相關主題與問題的研究探討與實作，以發展其研究能力。COURSE OVERVIEW This course is designed to provide students with in-depth discussions on principles, practices and issues of human resource development (HRD) programs and activities for the public sector. Lecturing, guest speakers, group discussions, case studies, oral presentations, and field trips will be employed to fulfill the educational goals of the course.
goals: Understand the nature of public service.
Gain insights about the practices and issues of HRD in the public sector.
Possess the skills for developing HR programs and activities for the public sector.
Develop the basic knowledge for conducting research projects related to HRD for the public sector.
syllabus:
**Course Objectives**

Upon successful completion of this course, the student will be able to

1\. Understand the nature of public service.

2\. Gain insights about the practices and issues of HRD in the public sector.

3\. Possess the skills for developing HR programs and activities for the public sector.

4\. Develop the basic knowledge for conducting research projects related to HRD for the public sector.

**Communication Chapter Leaders** (Rosenberg, 2015)

Each one 1 chapter. (Ch3,5,6,7,8)

\[In the class\] Report: 10 min

1.  Summarize the chapter
2.  Share your reflection 

\[After\]

1.  Apply all the steps in life.
2.  Write a reflection paper (3-5 pages. More is OK)

**Presentation of Conference Work**

\-Base on your study methods, each one presents in the class (7 min)

\-Provide feedback to other presenters.
